chat_history.message: Hello, My Galaxy S21 5G has the above problem: The device's issue is that it turns off when charging at a power outlet (wall socket). As a result, it cannot be charged. The only way to charge the battery is by connecting it to a laptop. Only then (after several attempts) does it charge. I have tried both with the provided cable and a new Samsung charger cable, but that doesn't work either. Thank you for your help.

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we do not have any available stocks for replacement. Instead, we have refunded the customer.

Regards,
AS
